name: Verdigrave Syndicate
shortDescription: The Verdigrave Syndicate are profiteers of collapse â€” smugglers, assassins, and relic-dealers who treat the end of the world as a business opportunity. Operating in guild-like cells, they specialize in sabotage, black market relics, and alchemical trickery. To them, faith is leverage. War is inventory.
description: The Verdigrave Syndicate are masters of alchemy and corruption. Their warriors are marked by verdigris growths that spread across their bodies, granting them the ability to transform their flesh into living metal or toxic compounds.
